cisDeductions.description: List of items that make up the overall deductions.

submissionId.description: The unique identifier for submission by the contractor.

fromDate.description: The CIS start date within the tax year.

toDate.description: The CIS start date within the tax year.

contractorName.description: The name of the contractor the subcontractor worked for.

employerRef.description: The unique identifier contractor reference number.

periodData.description: List of items that make up the overall deductions.

deductionAmount.description: The deducted amount relating to self-employment. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

deductionFromDate.description: The From date when the deduction was made within the CIS tax year window.

deductionToDate.description: The To date when the deduction was made within the CIS tax year window.

costOfMaterials.description: The cost of materials incurred for CIS.

grossAmountPaid.description: CIS deductions gross amount paid related to self-employment. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

submissionDate.description: CIS deductions gross amount paid related to self-employment. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

submittedBy.description: CIS deductions gross amount paid related to self-employment. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

links.description: A list of endpoint links that indicate possible actions related to the current resource

href.description: The relative url of the endpoint

rel.description: A label for the endpoint, which describes how it is related to the current resource. The rel will be self where the action is retrieval of the same resource

method.description: The HTTP method type for the endpoint
